scripts.test: export GANACHE_CORE=true && npm run prepublish && mocha --exit --full-trace --async-stack-traces -r ./tsinit.js --exclude ./test/gas-scenarios.spec.ts ./test/*.spec.ts --timeout 1200000000
scripts.test-ropsten: export ETHEREUM_URL=https://ropsten.infura.io/v3/62f4815d28674debbe4703c5eb9d413c && export WEB3_DRIVER_VERBOSE=true && npm run prepublish && mocha --bail --exit --full-trace -r ./tsinit.js --exclude ./test/gas-scenarios.spec.ts ./test/*.spec.ts --timeout 1200000000
scripts.test-kovan: export ETHEREUM_URL=https://kovan.infura.io/v3/62f4815d28674debbe4703c5eb9d413c && export WEB3_DRIVER_VERBOSE=true && npm run prepublish && mocha --bail --exit --full-trace -r ./tsinit.js --exclude ./test/gas-scenarios.spec.ts ./test/*.spec.ts --timeout 1200000000
scripts.test-gas-scenarios: export GANACHE_CORE=true && npm run prepublish && mocha --exit --full-trace -r ./tsinit.js ./test/gas-scenarios.spec.ts --timeout 600000
scripts.coverage: npm run prepublish && export GAS_LIMIT=1000000000 && truffle run coverage
scripts.prepublish: echo 'Compiling .sol and .ts...' && rm -rf ./release/ && rm -rf ./build/ && rm -rf ./abi/ && tsc --project tsconfig.json --declaration --declarationMap --skipLibCheck --outDir ./release && truffle compile && mkdir -p release/build/contracts release/typings release/abi &&  cp -r build/contracts/. release/build/contracts && ./extractAbi.sh && cp -r abi/. release/abi
scripts.start-ganache: mkdir -p _out && ganache-cli -p 7545 -i 5777 -a 1000 --gasLimit 0x7FFFFFFF --gasPrice 1 -m  "vanish junk genuine web seminar cook absurd royal ability series taste method identify elevator liquid" > _out/ganache.log
scripts.stop-ganache: ps -x    | grep "ganache-cli -p 7545 -i 5777" | grep -v grep | cut -f 1 -d " " | xargs echo | xargs kill
